byte.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to eight bits (=the smallest unit on which information is stored on a computer)
byte.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Each character requires one byte of storage space.
byte.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a unit of computer information that can hold one number or letter. A byte is made up of eight BITs (=the smallest units of storage on a computer). The amount of processing space on a computer is measured in MEGABYTEs (=a million bytes), so for example a PC with 32 megabytes of space has space for 32 million bytes of information
